title: White: Jones, 37, retires; Aspinall now champion
description: Jon Jones, 37, widely considered the greatest mixed martial artist of all time, has retired from competition, UFC CEO Dana White announced on Saturday, later telling reporters that the fighter informed the promotion of his decision on Friday.
author: Brett Okamoto

title: Devers goes deep vs. Red Sox, downplays homer
description: Rafael Devers' first home run as a Giant came against his former teammates in Boston on Saturday, but he said it was "nothing more special than any other home run that I've hit."
author: Jesse Rogers

title: 'Play on, pontiff' - Pope repays England's faith
description: Ollie Pope repaid England's faith with his best hundred in a home Test, writes Stephan Shemilt.

title: Fighting spirit lifts England U21s as they eye more history
description: England show fight to beat Spain and reach the European Under-21 Championship semi-finals, now can Lee Carsley's side defend their title?

title: 'It gave me goosebumps' - Duckett's delight at 'legend' Pope's century
description: Ben Duckett admitted he had "goosebumps" watching under-pressure Ollie Pope score a century on day two of the first Test between England and India at Headingley.

title: Pope hits hundred as England fight back in first Test against India
description: Ollie Pope struck a ninth Test century as part of a stirring England fightback on day two of the first Test at Headingley, the hosts closing on 209-3 in reply to India's first-innings 471.

title: Reds' Elly De La Cruz and Mariners reliever Trent Thornton fall ill while playing in extreme heat
description: Cincinnati Reds shortstop Elly De La Cruz and Seattle Mariners reliever Trent Thornton got sick Saturday while playing in the extreme heat that covered much of the United States. De La Cruz vomited on the field with two outs in the fourth inning of Cincinnati's extra-inning loss at the St. Louis Cardinals. The 23-year-old De La Cruz, who is from the Dominican Republic, stayed in the game and hit a two-run homer in the seventh.
author: The Associated Press

title: Dolphins' Tyreek Hill Begs for Jalen Ramsey to Return
description: Dolphins' Tyreek Hill Begs for Jalen Ramsey to Return
